Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -1,1 +1,44 @@ - +"use client" + +import { useMouseEffect } from "@/hooks/use-mouse-effect" +import { cn } from "@/lib/utils/utils" + +interface MouseReflectionProps { + readonly className?: string + readonly intensity?: number + readonly color?: string + readonly blur?: number + readonly opacity?: number +} + +export function MouseReflection({ + className, + intensity = 1, + color = "rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.4)", + blur = 150, + opacity = 0.5, +}: MouseReflectionProps) { + const { mousePosition, isMounted } = useMouseEffect({ + intensity, + smoothing: 0.1, + }) + + if (!isMounted) return null + + const gradientStyle = { + background: `radial-gradient( + circle at ${mousePosition.x}% ${mousePosition.y}%, + ${color} 0%, + transparent ${blur}% + )`, + opacity, + transform: `translate(${(mousePosition.x - 50) * 0.08}%, ${(mousePosition.y - 50) * 0.08}%)`, + } + + return ( +
+
